#id=1
#text=After making the decision to take a bath , I began to prepare .
#id=2
#text=I started by getting out my bubble bath , several candles , and a book to read .
#id=3
#text=I placed candles all around the perimeter of the tub and began to light them .
#id=4
#text=After all the candles were lit , I started the tub 's water and adjusted it to the appropriate temperature that I wanted .
#id=5
#text=I then placed the stopper in the drain and added a substantial amount of bubble bath to the water .
#id=6
#text=After the tub was filled , I shut off the water and began to disrobe .
#id=7
#text=After removing my clothing , I took hold of my book and settled in to the tub to soak and relax for awhile .
#id=8
#text=I read my book until the water began to get cold .
#id=9
#text=I then took a few minutes to make sure I was clean , scrubbing myself all over .
#text=After that was complete , I removed the stopper to drain the water , blew out the candles , and climbed out of the tub .
#text=I then toweled off and put on my bath robe .
